alert.note: Alert for Eastern Juab, Millard Counties; Southwest Utah; Western Millard and Juab Counties (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 01 at 3:35AM MDT until November 04 at 12:00AM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM NOON WEDNESDAY TO MIDNIGHT MDT THURSDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 6 inches in lower elevation areas. Total snow accumulations of 6 to 12 inches in higher elevation areas. * WHERE...Western Millard and Juab Counties, Eastern Juab/Millard Counties and Southwest Utah. * WHEN...From noon Wednesday to midnight MDT Thursday night. * IMPACTS...Winter driving conditions, especially for mountain passes.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For winter road conditions from the Utah Department of Transportation, visit http://www.udottraffic.utah.gov/roadweatherforecast.aspx or dial 511.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Juab, Millard Counties; Southwest Utah; Western Millard and Juab Counties
